publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3426 Margaret Mitchell: Elizabeth Montgomerie Building—That the Parliament welcomes the proposed Elizabeth Montgomerie Building at Monklands Hospital, the first cancer centre to be funded by a foundation established by Scottish golfer Colin Montgomerie; considers that the benefits for the hospital will be enormous and the vital service provided by the NHS can only be complimented by this kind of initiative, and therefore wishes Colin Montgomerie and Maggie’s Cancer Care Centres the very best of luck in getting the project off the ground.
S3M-3426 Elizabeth Montgomerie Building (lodged on 10 February 2009) Mary Scanlon*
S3M-3426 Elizabeth Montgomerie Building (lodged on 10 February 2009) Jamie McGrigor*

S3M-3426 Margaret Mitchell: Elizabeth Montgomerie Building—That the Parliament welcomes the proposed Elizabeth Montgomerie Building at Monklands Hospital, the first cancer centre to be funded by a foundation established by Scottish golfer Colin Montgomerie; considers that the benefits for the hospital will be enormous and the vital service provided by the NHS can only be complimented by this kind of initiative, and therefore wishes Colin Montgomerie and Maggie’s Cancer Care Centres the very best of luck in getting the project off the ground. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Jamie McGrigor, John Lamont*, Jackson Carlaw*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Aitken*, David McLetchie*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, John Wilson*, Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-3426 Elizabeth Montgomerie Building (lodged on 10 February 2009) Aileen Campbell*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Ted Brocklebank*
S3M-3426 Elizabeth Montgomerie Building (lodged on 10 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3426 Elizabeth Montgomerie Building (lodged on 10 February 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3426 Elizabeth Montgomerie Building (lodged on 10 February 2009) Tom McCabe*
